entry.title: NETIZEN Project for Youth Workers
entry.content:
Youth Organization are welcome to use our Netizen project for their activities while working with young people.

Download Netizen Project
entry.summary: Youth Organization are welcome to use our Netizen project for their activities while working with young people.

entry.title: Security 101- Digital Security and Privacy for Youth Workers

link.title: Security 101- Digital Security and Privacy for Youth Workers

entry.content:
This project aims to create a practice of youth resilience building and education for cyber hygiene by providing, practicing and disseminating the relevant tools in youth work in partner organizations…

Download InfoPack
entry.summary: This project aims to create a practice of youth resilience building and education for cyber hygiene by providing, practicing and disseminating the relevant tools in youth work in partner organizations…
